General.Name: Prochem S.A.
General.Description: Prochem S.A. provides engineering and general construction services in Poland. It offers pre-investment services, such as software -and-spatial concepts, expert studies, and technical recommendations; and conducts feasibility studies for new investment projects, as well as for the purpose of modernization and extension projects. The company provides design services in various disciplines and stages comprising obtaining arrangements, approvals, and permits, as well as offers investment management services. In addition, it provides delivery and consulting related services. Further, the company offers turnkey services. The company serves manufacturing, oil and gas, process plants, power industry, construction, and environment protection sectors. Prochem S.A. was founded in 1947 and is based in Warsaw, Poland.
